title: Common elements in today's graphical user interfaces: the good, the bad, and the ugly
proctitle: CHI '93: Proceedings of the INTERACT '93 and CHI '93 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems
abstract: This panel will identify some of the similarities amongst the different familiar graphical user interfaces that make them seem so indistinguishable. This panel will then identify some of the similarities that don't belong in any modern user interface.

authors.name: A. Brady Farrand
authors.institution: Tandem Computers, 10300 North Tantau Avenue, Loc 55-54, Cupertino, CA
